column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We got here on a Saturday evening for dinner around 7.30pm. We didn't want to sit at the community table and preferred waiting. We were told the wait time would be 35-40 minutes and it was actually only 5 minutes. We got the pork dumping appetizer
column3: creamy vegan ramen and sprouting up pork ramen. The food was delicious!!! I like my ramen warm and not hot
column4: but my husband prefers it hot so he had to send his back for more time on the stove. Other than that it was great
